name: Euclid
what_did:
Euclid wrote a book called 'The Elements' all about shapes, lines, and angles.
He explained how geometry works and taught people how to prove things step by step.
His book was used in schools for over 2,000 years!
why_matters:
Euclid made geometry easy to understand.
He showed that math could be built from clear rules.
His work helped people learn logic and problem-solving.
